explains: adj. 男权的；男子主宰的；男子控制的；男性占主导地位的

sentences.en: How many judges in our male-dominated courts are sensitized to women's issues?
sentences.cn: 在男性占主导的法庭上，会有多少法官对妇女问题敏感呢？

sentences.en: Women's sports are breaking down the barriers in previously male-dominated domains.
sentences.cn: 女子体育运动正在打破障碍进入一些先前由男子占主导地位的领域。

sentences.en: The coming of age of the postwar baby boom and an entry of women into the male-dominated job market have limited the opportunities of teenagers.
sentences.cn: 战后婴儿潮的到来，以及女性进入男性主导的就业市场，限制了青少年的就业机会。
